Recommendations.Title: Solar panels - New Forest District Council
Key Strengths: Direct information about solar panels from the New Forest District Council
Covers permissible development regarding solar panels installation
Recommendations.Reasoning: This link provides detailed information on solar panels and their installation in a council context, which is directly relevant to the user's request. The snippet indicates that solar panels generally do not require planning permission as they fall under permitted development.

Recommendations.Title: Energy efficiency planning advice - New Forest District Council
Key Strengths: Official council resource on energy efficiency and planning advice
Includes guidelines for solar panels, air-source heat pumps and windows
Recommendations.Reasoning: This link contains comprehensive information about energy efficiency planning advice from the New Forest District Council. The snippet explicitly mentions solar panels as one of the solutions that may require planning permission in certain locations.
